name: Swaprs
description: Swaprs is a young startup with big aspirations. Our goal is to build and commercialize the world’s most effective online marketplace for swapping goods and services. We’re making swapping as easy, quick and effective as it is to buy and sell on Facebook Marketplace, whereby users can swap almost any combination of items and services with each other - books for books, clothes for guitar lessons, phones for furniture, maths tutoring for language lessons and so on. Our platform removes cross-category barriers and allows swapping opportunities for anyone. Almost any item you own, or skill you possess, or spare time you have, can be swapped on our platform. In fact, our goal is to get millions of people to swap all kinds of goods and services. By doing so we can help people save money, waste less and keep useful stuff away from landfills!

jobs.title: Marketing Intern
jobs.description:
Swaprs is a young startup with big aspirations. We’re looking for a passionate intern who is dynamic and eager to learn. You’ll work directly with the CEO on all marketing-related aspects of the business - from social media to content marketing. Experience is not important, but drive is. If you are highly motivated and would like to take part in scaling a game-changing product, then you’d be a great fit for us. You will be working remotely and will be provided with all the tools and support you need to do your best work. 

Our fast-paced startup is an excellent opportunity for a young intern or entrepreneur to learn about how early stage companies operate. It will also add great experience to your CV and help you grow personally and professionally. 

You can reach me at luca@swaprs.com
